name: QR Code Plugin
description: Generate, decode, and beautify QR codes with advanced customization options including colors, logos, and styling. Provides both high-performance Node.js implementation and powerful Python-based advanced features.

pythonPath.description: Path to Python executable for advanced QR operations

enableAdvancedFeatures.description: Enable advanced features requiring Python (logo embedding, gradient colors, etc.)

outputDirectory.description: Directory for storing generated QR images when using web channel

assetsDirectory.description: Directory for storing logo and asset files when using web channel

autoProvideBase64.description: Automatically provide Base64 encoded image for web channel users

enableAdvancedFeatures.label: Enable Advanced Features
enableAdvancedFeatures.help: Requires Python with qrcode[pil], pillow, and pyzbar packages installed

outputDirectory.label: Output Directory
outputDirectory.help: Where to save generated QR images. Use ~/ for home directory, ./ for workspace relative.

assetsDirectory.label: Assets Directory
assetsDirectory.help: Where to store logo and asset files. Use ~/ for home directory, ./ for workspace relative.

autoProvideBase64.label: Auto Provide Base64
autoProvideBase64.help: Automatically include Base64 encoded image in web responses
